review: It's everything I hoped and more. Just wish iOS was a bit more friendly. But that's just wishful thinking, I concede. But bang for your buck, guaranteed!
author: Ashish Wesley

review: Great working device. A great buy!
author: Tom Kontak

review: Ive had some problems with my samsung tv. I have used it with other tvs and it works, but it just diesnt work wuth my samsung tv.
author: Arturo Herrador

review: Great gadget. Now I can mirror my pone to my monitor and watch youtube etc. Great!!
author: Tishan

review: Great looking at my Netflix on my big screen! I'm so glad I bought it,  price was unbelievable😊
author: Crissy

review: So nice to have after we cut the cable cord.  We use it to stream from our phones and laptops. Great range since we can stream from one bedroom into the living room. Having multiple ones throughout the house isn't a problem, since they are easily identifiable on the streaming device.
author: Renita Reavis
